title: Electronic Signature UI Component
description:
Create Signature Pad Component with Compliance-Ready Confirmation Dialog

Build a reusable signature capture component with an associated confirmation dialog that includes legally compliant messaging for user agreement workflows.

Requirements:

Signature Pad Component:
- Implement a canvas-based signature capture area with smooth drawing capability
- Support mouse, touch, and stylus input methods
- Provide clear/reset functionality to redraw signature
- Include visual indicators for signature area boundaries
- Validate that a signature has been drawn before allowing submission
- Export signature as image data (PNG/SVG) for storage
- Make component responsive and accessible (WCAG compliant)

Confirmation Dialog:
- Display the captured signature for user review
- Include clear compliance messaging (terms acceptance, legal agreement text)
- Show timestamp of signature capture
- Provide options to confirm or go back to redraw
- Include checkbox for explicit user consent where required
- Support customizable legal text/messaging based on use case

Additional Considerations:
- Ensure signature image quality is sufficient for legal/compliance purposes
- Handle edge cases: empty signatures, accidental marks, browser compatibility
- Consider signature size optimization for storage
- Add loading states during signature processing/submission
- Implement proper error handling if signature capture fails
